edu.uchsc.ccp.dmap.test
Class ParserTestContext

java.lang.Object
  edu.uchsc.ccp.dmap.test.ParserTestContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
TestContext
public class ParserTestContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements TestContext

This class implements a testing context appropriate for running tests of the OpenDMAP system itself. Instances of this class are created automatically by the testing framework when needed.

This class expects the test suite file to specify a Protege project and a set of pattern files. Upon initialization, a Parser object is created and the specified Protege project and patterns files are loaded.

The OpenDMAP testing classes get the initialized parser from this context.

Author:
R. James Firby

getParser

public Parser getParser()
Get the DMAP parser created during initialization of this context. This method is used by the DMAP test classes when they are run.

Returns:
The initialized parser.

initialize

public boolean initialize(TestSuite suite,
                          java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> errors)
Initialize a Parser and Protege Knowledge Base for use by tests. This method is used by the testing framework and should not be called by user code.

Specified by:
initialize in interface TestContext
Parameters:
suite - The test suite that is requesting this context.
errors - Errors added to this collection will be mentioned in the test suite output.
Returns:
True if initialization succeeds, false if the context cannot be used for tests.

terminate

public boolean terminate(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> errors)
Tear down this context. This method is used by the testing framework and should not be called by user code.

Specified by:
terminate in interface TestContext
Parameters:
errors - Errors added to this collection will be mentioned in the test suite output.
Returns:
False if the state cannot be unwound successfully.
